name: Word-O: The Viral Word Game!
description:
It's that fun, popular word game that everyone can't stop talking about except now it's available on your favorite dot matrix handheld*!

Quick and easy fun in your pocket!

Full "Wordle" dictionary (except for one slur I removed)!

Game statistics: Won, Lost, Streak & Win Percentage (since power on)

Exclusive (?) EXTRA MODE (See below)

Not connected to the internet at all!

32k ROM for amazing word power!

Really addictive!

*This is a real Game Boy ROM file and can be unzipped and played in any Game Boy emulator or flash cartridge/Everdrive on any Game Boy compatible handheld (or Super Game Boy).
